Function to calculate Omori's law

Source: R/plottingFunctions.R
omori.Rd

Function to calculate Omori's law

Usage

omori(theta, t, ti)

Arguments

theta

ETAS parameters (list(mu = mu, K = K, alpha = alpha, c = c, p = p), only parameters c and p are used

t

Time at which Omori's law is evaluated

ti

Time of the event in the history

Value

Value of Omori's law at point t for and event happened in ti

On this page
